## AudioManager.getAllOneshotAudios() method

Retrieves all oneshot (non-looped) audio instances for the world.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAllOneshotAudios(): Audio[];
```
**Returns:**

[Audio](./server.audio.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of audio instances.
